issue.title: [Plasma] Unmap memory when the client is destroyed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4983](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4983). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the plasma memory mapped into the client is not unmapped upon destruction of the client, which can cause memory mapped files to be kept around longer than necessary.
